pageContext.description: Max. dimension (chord) 134mm; Max. th. 38mm,One face fairly flat and even but with steep bevel towards extant edge; fairly smooth surface, a few hollows; reverse face convex - smooth towards thickest part, but more nodular surface towards edge; broken sections reveal columar structure - almost vertical.
pageContext.surface: Varied dull greens. Breaks all ancient. Light brown soil adhering.
pageContext.collection: Fish, Mr. D. - Private (no. 1),Churston Court Farm, Churston Ferrers, nr. Brixham, Devon
pageContext.site: England,Devon,Torbay,Churston Ferrers,Churston Court Farm,Found on a ploughed field by a farmer - Mr. D. Fish - within the last 10 years, ie. since 1968
pageContext.toSearch: Churston Ferrers, Brixham, Torbay Tq5, UK
pageContext.remarks: SN April 78,PI; AFI; SI; CI; DF(S); Submitted 6/4/78 by Mr. M.Pearson, Soton Univ.
